title: Prang Crayons 24 Color Box - Vibrant Crayons for Drawing and Crafting
description: The Prang Crayons 24 Color Box is your go-to set for all your drawing and crafting needs. This set includes 24 vibrant colors that are perfect for creating colorful artwork, educational projects, and imaginative designs. Each crayon is made with high-quality wax for smooth application and bright, bold colors. The crayons are non-toxic, making them safe for children and suitable for classroom use. Packaged in a durable box, the crayons are easy to organize and store. Whether you're working on a school project, exploring your artistic side, or just having fun, the Prang Crayons 24 Color Box provides everything you need for creative expression.
